name: Allison Of Astra: Finity Train (S1 E3)
name_original: Allison Of Astra: Finity Train (S1 E3)
description:
Planchette, a telekinetic runaway, is stuck on a train without a fare. But her immediate probiems are about to get a lot worse...

Contains a full Allison Of Astra adventure for your NES, plus the creative stamp program MESS MAKER! 

Try before you buy: play the browser version here!
